nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军已撤销的一个政治工作机关，曾是中央军事委员会的四总部之一，负责解放军的宣传、思想政治、组织、纪律、保卫及对外联络等工作。2016年1月在深化国防和军队改革中被撤销，职能由新成立的中央军委政治工作部等部门承接。
description.en: A defunct political work organ of the People's Liberation Army (PLA), formerly one of the four general headquarters under the Central Military Commission, responsible for propaganda, political thought, organization, discipline, security, and foreign liaison work. It was abolished in January 2016 during the military reforms, with its functions transferred to newly established departments such as the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会
中华人民共和国中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构，领导全国武装力量。中国人民解放军总政治部是其下属的四大总部之一。
description.en: The highest military command and control authority of the Chinese Communist Party and the People's Republic of China, which commands the nation's armed forces. The PLA General Political Department was one of its four general headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 由中共中央总书记、中央军委主席习近平推动的、于2015年开始的对中国人民解放军的全面改革，导致了包括总政治部在内的四总部被撤销，并重组为新的军委职能部门。
description.en: A comprehensive reform of the People's Liberation Army initiated in 2015, promoted by CCP General Secretary and CMC Chairman Xi Jinping, which led to the abolition of the four general headquarters, including the General Political Department, and their reorganization into new functional departments of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会政治工作部

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会政治工作部

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中成立的中央军委职能部门之一，承接了原总政治部的大部分职责。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission established during the military reform, which inherited most of the responsibilities of the former General Political Department.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
中央军委纪律检查委员会（监察委员会）
纪律检查委员会（监察委员会）

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中成立的中央军委职能部门之一，承接了原总政治部的纪律检查职责。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission established during the military reform, which inherited the disciplinary inspection responsibilities of the former General Political Department.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会政法委员会

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中成立的中央军委职能部门之一，承接了原总政治部的军事保卫、审判、检察职责。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission established during the military reform, which inherited the military security, judicial, and procuratorial responsibilities of the former General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 一场由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动，期间总政治部遭到严重破坏，机关陷于瘫痪。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, during which the General Political Department was severely damaged and its functions paralyzed.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，文化大革命期间的重要领导人之一。曾与江青等人提出“彻底砸烂总政阎王殿”，导致总政治部机关瘫痪。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China and a key leader during the Cultural Revolution. He, along with Jiang Qing and others, called for 'smashing the palace of the King of Hell of the General Political Department,' leading to the paralysis of the department.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东的最后一任妻子，文化大革命期间“四人帮”成员之一。曾与林彪等人提出“彻底砸烂总政阎王殿”，导致总政治部机关瘫痪。
description.en: The last wife of Mao Zedong and a member of the 'Gang of Four' during the Cultural Revolution. She, along with Lin Biao and others, called for 'smashing the palace of the King of Hell of the General Political Department,' leading to the paralysis of the department.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间设立的临时机构，在总政治部机关瘫痪后，取代了其领导职能。
description.en: A temporary body established during the Cultural Revolution that took over the leadership functions of the General Political Department after it was paralyzed.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党历史上具有深远意义的会议，标志着改革开放的开始。会后，总政治部的工作得以恢复和发展。
description.en: A meeting of profound significance in the history of the Chinese Communist Party, marking the beginning of the Reform and Opening-up. After the meeting, the work of the General Political Department was restored and developed.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，曾任中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总政治部主任及中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, served as Director of the General Political Department of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government and Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任、副主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director and Deputy Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: “四人帮”成员之一，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: A member of the 'Gang of Four', served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任中国人民解放军总政治部主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, served as Director of the PLA General Political Department.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，中国人民解放军总政治部最后一任主任。
description.en: General of the People's Liberation Army, the last Director of the PLA General Political Department.

nodes.id: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总政治部

zh-cn: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总政治部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部的前身，隶属于中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会。
description.en: The predecessor of the PLA General Political Department, subordinate to the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国家主席，曾任中共中央军委总政治部主任等职。
description.en: Former President of the People's Republic of China, served as Director of the General Political Department of the CMC of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军总政治部
relationships.target: 中央军事委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总政治部是中央军事委员会下属的四大总部之一。
description.en: The PLA General Political Department was one of the four general headquarters under the Central Military Commission.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 在深化国防和军队改革中，中国人民解放军总政治部被撤销。
description.en: During the deepening of national defense and military reform, the PLA General Political Department was abolished.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会政治工作部

description.zh-cn: 作为改革的一部分，中央军事委员会政治工作部被组建，以承接原总政治部的部分职责。
description.en: As part of the reform, the Political Work Department of the Central Military Commission was established to take over some of the responsibilities of the former General Political Department.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为改革的一部分，中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会被组建，以承接原总政治部的纪律检查职责。
description.en: As part of the reform, the Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission was established to take over the disciplinary inspection responsibilities of the former General Political Department.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 作为改革的一部分，中央军事委员会政法委员会被组建，以承接原总政治部的军事保卫、审判、检察职责。
description.en: As part of the reform, the Political and Legal Affairs Commission of the Central Military Commission was established to take over the military security, judicial, and procuratorial responsibilities of the former General Political Department.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，总政治部受到严重破坏，领导干部被批斗，机关陷于瘫痪，直至1969年12月才恢复办公。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the General Political Department was severely damaged, its leaders were persecuted, and its functions were paralyzed until it resumed operations in December 1969.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 林彪与江青等人提出“彻底砸烂总政阎王殿”的口号，导致总政治部机关及其领导受到严重冲击。
description.en: Lin Biao, along with Jiang Qing and others, put forward the slogan 'thoroughly smash the General Political Department, the Palace of the King of Hell,' which led to severe attacks on the department and its leadership.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 江青与林彪等人提出“彻底砸烂总政阎王殿”的口号，导致总政治部机关及其领导受到严重冲击。
description.en: Jiang Qing, along with Lin Biao and others, put forward the slogan 'thoroughly smash the General Political Department, the Palace of the King of Hell,' which led to severe attacks on the department and its leadership.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 在总政治部机关瘫痪后，军委办事组政工组取代了其领导职能，直至总政治部恢复工作。
description.en: After the General Political Department was paralyzed, the Political Work Group of the CMC Administrative Group replaced its leadership functions until the General Political Department resumed its work.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会第三次全体会议
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 中共十一届三中全会以后，总政治部的工作得到了恢复和发展。
description.en: After the Third Plenary Session of the 11th Central Committee of the CPC, the work of the General Political Department was restored and developed.

relationships.source: 中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总政治部
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总政治部

description.zh-cn: 1954年，中央人民政府人民革命军事委员会总政治部正式改名为中国人民解放军总政治部。
description.en: In 1954, the General Political Department of the People's Revolutionary Military Commission of the Central People's Government was officially renamed the General Political Department of the People's Liberation Army.
